full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Overhaul of Aircraft Landing Gear Components

### Title
_____________________

### Tender Number(s)
T8593-22-0011

### Publication Date
August 10, 2022

### Closing Date and Time
September 22, 2022, 02:00 PM ET

### Solicitation Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Description
Transport Canada is soliciting proposals for a service requirement to overhaul the Safran Landing Systems (formerly Messier Dowty) Dehavilland Dash-8 (100) landing gear components over a period of 12 years.

### Key Dates
Period of the Contract: Date of Contract award to October 31st, 2022, inclusive.

### Trade Agreements
The solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, as well as the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Basis of Selection
Award will be made to the most responsive bidder in accordance with Section 8 of the Contracting Authority's Assessment Criteria. The basis of selection is based on a compliant bidder with the lowest total evaluated cost.

### Eligibility
Eligible bidders may be any person or firm meeting the requirements set forth in the RFP who is able to supply the goods and services specified.

### Contact Information
Tanya Nadeau, Contracting Authority, tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca, 343-575-6684

### Request for Proposal Documents
Documents can be downloaded from Canada Buys [1] or obtained through Request For Proposal T8593-22-0011aGSIN/PIN: JX1620A.

### Mandatory Attachment
A mandatory attachment is available at the Contracting Authority's website, which must be read, downloaded and printed or printed off prior to drafting responses. 

Please note that the above text has been rewritten from the original to make it more readable and better formatted. ^{1. Canada Buys: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders?q=](https://buyands
